body.p: Sir- I hereby send you my resignation as 1s Lieutenant in the Ky State Guard. Inclosed please find my commission-
Capt Hope (to whose Company I belonged) & Col Hanson having resigned, I send my resignation directly to you, hoping that it will answer, & that it will be immediately accepted-

Most Resplty
Your Obt Svt
B. W. Buckner
Buckners-resignation-

Accepted
B. Magoffin
Com in Chief.
